channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21915] Hive with TEZ UNION ALL and UDTF results in data loss
item.description:
The HQL syntax is like this:

CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tez_union_all_loss_data AS
SELECT xxx, yyy, zzz,1 as tag
FROM ods_1

UNION ALL

SELECT xxx, yyy, zzz, tag
FROM
(
SELECT xxx
,get_json_object(get_json_object(tb,'$.a'),'$.b') AS yyy
,zzz
,2 as tag
FROM ods_2
LATERAL VIEW EXPLODE(some_udf(uuu)) team_number AS tb
) tbl
;

 

With above HQL, we are expecting that rows with both tag = 2 and tag = 1 appear. In our case however, all the rows with tag = 1 are lost.

Dig deeper we can find that the generated two maps have identical task tmp paths. And that results from when UDTF is present, the FileSinkOperator will be processed twice generating the tmp path in GenTezUtils.removeUnionOperators();
item.summary: Hive with TEZ UNION ALL and UDTF results in data loss

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Just added a patch for this issue. Anybody help to review the code?
zhangweilst Thanks for providing the patch. Can you please add a test?

ATTACHMENT ID: 12972724 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Have reproduced this issue with hive test dataset and added a query test in the new patch.

UPDATE:

We have to set hive.merge.tezfiles=true; to reproduce this issue, and updated the test case to turn on file merge.

In our settings, hive.merge.tezfiles defaults to true. Ignored this factor before.
